tool.name: MemprotmdSimSearch
tool.description: : This class is a wrapper of the MemProtMD to perform advanced searches in the MemProtMD DB using its REST API.
tool.command:
#if $config.sele == "option1": ln -s -f ${config.properties} ${config.properties}_`echo $$`.${config.properties.ext}; #end if
memprotmd_sim_search
#if $config.sele == "option1": --config ${config.properties}_`echo $$`.${config.properties.ext} #else if $config.sele == "option2": --config '${config.jsonstr}' #else if $config.sele == "option3": --config '__oc____dq__collection_name__dq__:__dq__${properties.collection_name}__dq__,__dq__keyword__dq__:__dq__${properties.keyword}__dq____cc__' #end if
--output_simulations $outname_output_simulations ; #if $config.sele == "option1": rm -f ${config.properties}_`echo $$`.${config.properties.ext}; #end if
if test -f $outname_output_simulations; then mv $outname_output_simulations $output_simulations; fi;

param.name: outname_output_simulations
param.label: output JSON name
param.help: Path to the output JSON file Format: [output].json

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from
param.option: Manual Input
from configuration file
from JSON string

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: collection_name
param.label: collection_name
param.help: Name of the collection to query.

param.name: keyword
param.label: keyword
param.help: String to search for in the database metadata. Examples are families like gpcr or porin.
param.option: porin
